Translations.Text: Ani amhica isra'ilacya santatila (atisaya) apamanadayaka siksa-yatanepasuna mukti dili
(Ji) phira'aunatarphe (dili jata) hoti. Vastavika to vidrohi ani maryadece ullanghana karanaryampaiki hota
Ani amhi janunabujuna isra'ilacya santatila jagatila lokanvara sresthata pradana keli
Ani amhi tyanna asa nisanya pradana kelya, jyancyata ughada kasoti hoti
Ki (antima gosta) heca amace pahilyanda (jagata) marana pavane ahe ani amhi dusaryanda uthavilo janara nahita
Jara tumhi sacce asala tara amacya purvajanna ghe'una ya
Kaya he loka adhika cangale aheta ki tubba'a cya janasamuhace loka ani je tyancyahi purvice hote? Amhi tya sarvanna nasta karuna takale. Nihsansaya, te aparadhi hote
Ani amhi akasanna va dharatila ani tyancya daramyanacya vastunna khela svarupata nirmana kele nahi
Kimbahuna amhi tyanna ucita hetusahaca nirmana kele ahe. Parantu adhikansa loka he janata nahita
Nihsansaya, nirnayaca divasa tya sarvansathi nirdharita veli ahe
Tya divasi koni mitra kona mitracya kahica kami yenara nahi ani na tyanci madata keli ja'ila
Parantu (tyacyakherija) jyacyavara allahaci daya - krpa vhavi. Nihsansaya, to motha saktisali ani daya karanara ahe
